runs.comm: angled in fuller on middle, forward and pushed to the covers
Bang goes Tamim. Down the track and launches it over long-on
flighted outside off, nips down the track and goes over the covers. Wahab runs across to his right from long-off, slides, aims to flick the ball in, but his effort is in vain
and againn! Tamim charges down the track again and lifts it beautifully over the covers

Sarkar has been caught short, he is gone for 0 off 0 balls on T20I debut. This was flatter and on the pad. Tamim ticks it to square leg. Sarkar, though, was a tad late to respond. Ajmal collects the ball quickly, he had only stump to aim at, nailed it.
full and outside off, driven to the covers
good length outside off, blocked to point
he comes down the track, Tanvir is wary of it as he pushes this well outside off. Tamim can't connect
angling onto the pads, misses the glance. This was snaking down leg, I guess
back of a length on middle, sticks in the pitch, stops on the batsman. Shakib drops it in front of his feet
back of a length and outside off, he waits on it and eases it to third man via an angled bat
fullish and angled in, forward and solidly defended
back of a length and outside off, Shakib waits on the back foot and glides it to deep third man

Umar Gul strikes with his second ball. He sets off on a mini-airplane celebration. Dug in on a back of a length and angling away outside off, Tamim flashes away from the body, gets a thick outside edge, which is held by Hafeez, moving to his left
fullish with a hint of away movement outside off, poked towards point
fuller and on off and middle, Mushfiq presses forward and drives it past the non-striker, beats mid-on and mid-off. Gorgeous stroke
crackalicious! Overpitched and outside off, he bends his knee and drives it past Shehzad at backward point
angled in just outside off on a shortish length. Mushfiq gets on top of the bounce and dabs it in front of point
an appeal for lbw, turned down. Fullish and comes in with the angle, he is pinned on the back foot. Rapped on the front pad. Might have been going down leg
picked away off the pads to the right of short fine, diving save
fuller and angling away on off, poked into short cover
length angling away, tapped gently to gully
Tanvir drags it shortish and outside off, sits up to be hit. Mushfiq rocks back and pulls it over mid-on. Not middled, but no problem
good length ball on the fourth-stump line, patted to mid-off for a speedy single. Shakib reciprocated well
tossed up on off, Mushfiq goes low and slog-sweeps it over square leg. He loves the slog-sweep, doesn't he?
straighter on middle, driven down to long-off for one
pushed through quicker outside off, Mushfiq looks to cut, chops it to slip on the bounce
fuller and on middle, slog-swept away towards deep backward square
back of a length and outside off, pushed to point. The pair look for single but decide against it. The fielder effects a direct hit at the non-strikers'. Mushfiq is in
tapped to extra-cover, finds the fielder
nearly chopped on first ball! Back of a length and on middle, skiddy pace, bounces over the stumps
length-delivery outside off, Mushfiq races down the track and lashes it in the gap between covers and mid-off
dug in shortish and outside off, he hops up and steers it to point

the middle stump goes for a wander! Chopped on now. The crowd has been hushed into silence. Fractionally back of a length, angling away. Mushfiq is crease-bound as he aims to punch it away. Drags it back on off an inside edge
back of a length on middle, tucked away to the right of Ajmal at mid-on for a couple
leg-stump ball, picked away off the hips to the left of short fine
skiddy short ball outside off, he rocks back and cracks it away past backward point. Beats Wahab in the deep at sweeper
much slower through the air, dabbed to point
back of a length on middle, punched off the back foot to wide long-on
dropped shortish and outside off, cut away towards short third man
fuller and on off, he takes a step forward and wristily pushes it back to Afridi
pushed through flatter and quicker, he steps out, does not meet the pitch of the ball. Takes it on the pad. The ball rolls back to the bowler
shortish and on off, tapped to point
shortish and on the hips, glanced away to fine leg, where the fielder runs to his right and hunts the ball down. Two is the outcome
back of a length and on middle, worked away through midwicket. They take a single by the time the man from the deep comes in to collect the ball
fuller and straighter, he leans across and flicks it behind the square leg umpire
back of a length and hurries on middle, tucks up the batsman for room. He manages an inside edge and keeps it out
much short and wide outside off, swipe and a miss
Shakib uses his feet, yorks himself. Does not get hold of the drive, off the bottom edge and the ball runs away through slip
much fuller and outside off, he bends his knees and flat-bats a drive past the bowler to the long-off fence
Afridi gives this more air outside off, he drives it to sweeper with an open face
fullish and outside off, slog-sweep and miss
quicker and outside off, slapped away behind point off the back foot
Sabbir premeditates a reverse-sweep, Afridi fires a seam-up ball. Sabbir adjusts and defends it
flighted on middle, he uses his feet and chips it over the bowler for a couple
paddled to the right of short fine, full-length dive from Tanvir
fired outside off on a shortish length, Sabbir waits on the back foot, rides the bounce and dabs it to the off side
fuller and on off, he uses his feet and drills it back at the bowler. Ajmal bends down, gets a hand onto it and deflects it to the right of long-off
crip and clean! Flighted and outside off, Shakib nips down the track, meets the pitch of the ball and lofts it straight down the ground. No chance for long-on and long-off
Ajmal loops it up, Shakib defends it
dug in shortish and hurries on middle, not much room to play with. Dabbed in front of point
back of a length and outside off, Gul dragged his length back as Sabbir skipped out, flat-batted over mid-off
back of a length and outside off, steered to the right of a diving backward point. Beats deep third man as well. Superb timing and equally good placement
banged in short and directed at the ribs, he goes for a pull and top-edges it over long leg
slowy ball outside off, he waits on it and pats it to point
back of a length outside off, slogged to midwicket off the inner part of the bat
Shakib takes a step forward, takes it on the full and drives it to the covers
full on middle, driven to long-off for an oh-so-easy single
back of a length, slides on to rap the batsman on the front pad. Sliding down. Might have pitched outside leg too
Afridi floats it up, use of the feet and driven down to long-on
darted on the leg stump, pushed to the left of long-on for a couple
dropped short and wide outside off, he looks to cut and slices it in front of short third man, diving to his left. The ball did not carry to Gul
whack! Fractionally back of a length and outside off, he flat-batted it over the bowler, tennis-style
length angling away outside off, he looks to run it down to third man but is beaten
skier and falls in front of third man. Length outside off, he aims to swipe it away over the leg side. Shoots it up in the air with a sliced hit. The ball lands in front of Gul
veering onto the pads now, neat glance to the fine-leg boundary
back of a length, angling in on middle, whisked to the leg side
back of a length and just a shade outside off, Shakib waits on it before steering it down to third man
slowy ball on middle and off, defended in front of point
slash and a miss to a back-of-a-length ball outside off
width on offer outside off, Shakib cashes in as he cuts it up and over a leaping backward point. Sweetly timed
length on off, down the track, does not meet the pitch of the ball and chips it tamely in front of long-on
Angles in a bumper outside off, he sways away from the line. Wided for height
angled in full on middle and leg, he leans forward and flicks it behind square leg. Deep square leg runs to his right and keeps it to two
very full and angled in on off, laced to long-on
Sabbir welcomes back Ajmal with a superbly connected reverse sweep to the right of Gul at short third man
off-break, tossed up. Nudged behind square on the leg side for one
fuller and on the fourth-stump line, down the track and drilled to long-off
angled on the pads from round the stumps, glanced to short fine
angled on middle, worked in front of square on the leg side now
lobbed up on off, Shakib was aiming to drill it through the covers. Checks his shot at the last moment and blocks it in front of Ajmal
banged in short and just below rib-height, he aims for a pull. Hit high on the bat but gets it over mid-on
angled away outside off with some extra lift, guided to deep third man. Nifty work from Sabbir
pitched further up and outside off, Shakib flows forward and eases a drive to sweeper cover
crackin' hit from Sabbir. Back of a length and outside off, slapped past short cover, whistles away to the boundary
fifty for Sabbir. Banged in shortish, sort of stops on the batsman. Mistimes the pull in the air over backward square leg
Shakib reaches a fifty of his own. Dug in shortish, Shakib hammers a pull and sends it to the deep midwicket fence
flighted on middle, he gets enough bat on the paddle-sweep to short fine
Bangladesh win - their first over Pakistan in T20s. This was fullish and outside off, Shakib makes room and laces it inside-out past the covers
